attributes.action: BAN THE SALE AND PUBLIC USE OF ALL FIREWORKS
attributes.additional_details: It is time for the annual terrorising of people and animals to end. It is also beyond common sense to allow the general public access to increasingly powerful forms of explosives which could be used for criminal intent. Introduce a system of licensing for approved people to purchase and let fireworks off in organised displays.
attributes.background: Ban the retail and wholesale selling of fireworks to the general public.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
